chat.krate.upgrade.not.applicable: This upgrade are only applicable to
info.krate.filter: Used to filter what items pass to or from a krate inventory
info.krate.hopper_upgrade: It is an Item transfer upgrade, which allows items to be pushed/pulled from on adjacent inventory
info.krate.collect_upgrade: Krate will start collecting items in a configurable block radius
info.krate.compact_upgrade: Krate will automatically craft items into blocks, you can choose 2X2 or 3X3 crafting matrix
info.krate.shulker_upgrade: Krate will keep its inventory items when broken
info.krate.small_to_basic: Used to upgrade from small to basic krate, right-click a small krate with it to apply
info.krate.basic_to_big: Used to upgrade from basic to big krate, right-click a basic krate with it to apply
info.krate.big_to_large: Used to upgrade from big to large krate, right-click a big krate with it to apply
